channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Amazon a attendu 2026 pour baisser le prix de l’Apple Watch Series 11 dans sa version 46 mm
item.description: Lancée en fin d'année dernière, l'Apple Watch Series 11 est arrivée avec quelques nouveautés intéressantes. C'est dans son format 46 mm qu'elle est actuellement plus recommandable : Amazon la propose à 449 euros au lieu de 479 euros. Soit le prix de lancement de la version 42 mm.

item.title: Nostalgie BlackBerry : Clicks dévoile le Communicator, un smartphone à clavier physique comme dans le bon vieux temps
item.description: Cela fait bien longtemps que les claviers physiques ont perdu la partie face aux écrans tactiles. Mais il existe toujours une curiosité — et même un véritable intérêt — autour de ces boutons bien réels, synonymes pour certains de confort de frappe et de productivité. La start-up Clicks entend bien raviver cette flamme avec le Communicator, un smartphone Android à clavier physique qui assume pleinement son positionnement à contre-courant....

item.title: This Beetle Is in a Toxic Relationship With a Tree. Luckily, They Know a Fungi
item.description: Three's a crowd: Tree, beetle, and fungus don't get along, but they're surviving together.

item.title: Icon Meets Icon in the New Trailer for ‘The Muppet Show’ Revival
item.description: Miss Piggy is giving Sabrina Carpenter the house tour.

item.title: This smart fridge wants to solve the hassle of grocery shopping
item.description: Have you always wanted to scan your groceries at home? If so, the newest smart fridge from GE Appliances is for you. There's a barcode scanner built into the water dispenser that works along with an interior camera and an 8-inch tablet to help you keep track of what food you need and add it […]

item.title: Pebble’s round smartwatch is getting a reboot
item.description: It's time to reboot another OG Pebble smartwatch - specifically, the round-faced Time Round, which is getting a follow-up more than a decade after its original launch. The new Pebble Round 2 improves upon its predecessor with longer battery life and a larger 1.3-inch touchscreen display, ditching the chunky bezel that surrounded the original Time […]...

item.description: Here is the full list of the logistics, manufacturing, and materials Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.description: Pebble launches a $199 smartwatch with rounded screen that can last up to 2 weeks on one charge.

item.title: I tried an electric bike to get me back into gravel riding without the shame of being woefully unfit
item.description: With stealthy electric propulsion, the Ribble CGR E AL is the perfect excuse to get back in the saddle.

item.description: The first week of 2026 is packed with new releases to watch, from the streaming debut of new movies to the Stranger Things season 5 finale.

item.title: Pebble brings its round-faced smartwatch back from the dead
item.description: You’ve probably heard people say it’s impossible to go back and correct some error from the past. To those people, you should raise a middle finger in defiance (they are miserable, after all), and then point them to the tale of Pebble’s unlikely revival. The smartwatch pioneer’s return was a surprise of 2025, and now the company has resurrected one of its last great triumphs. It’s announcing the Pebble Round 2, and company founder Eric Migicovsky is looking to put right what once went wrong. The Pebble Round 2 is the successor to the Pebble Time Round, which debuted in 2015 to what can only b...

item.title: 3 ethical AI questions every brand leader should be asking
item.description: Transparency will be at the forefront of the most innovative companies going forward.

item.title: C’est l’événement astronomique de l’année 2026 : voici où et comment voir l’éclipse du Soleil
item.description: L’année 2026 nous réserve un événement astronomique majeur : le 12 août prochain aura en effet lieu une éclipse solaire presque totale pour la France métropolitaine ! Un moment à ne pas manquer. Voici donc ce qu’il faut savoir pour en profiter au maximum.

item.title: Tesla Loses Its EV Crown to BYD as Sales Keep Dropping
item.description: Full-year electric vehicle sales figures have dropped for 2025, revealing China's BYD is now officially global top dog.

item.title: Engadget Podcast: Everything we expect at CES 2026
item.description: We’re gearing up for CES 2026! Engadget will be on the ground, once again, to dive into the latest TVs, wearables and other wild tech from the world’s biggest consumer electronics show. In this episode, we chat about some new products we expect to see, like Micro RGB LED TVs and AI devices, and peer into what’s ahead for the rest of 2026.Subscribe!iTunesSpotifyPocket CastsStitcherGoogle PodcastsCreditsHosts: Devindra HardawarProducer: Ben Ellman Music: Dale North and Terrence O'BrienThis article originally appeared on Engadget at https://www.engadget.com/social-media/engadget-podcast-everythin...

item.title: Why is Sprinkles Cupcakes closing? TikTok critics focus their ire on private equity as beloved bakery folds
item.description: Candace Nelson, founder of the brand known for its cupcake ATMs, received an interesting response when she asked people to share their memories. Sprinkles Cupcakes, the company known for its sweet treats and iconic cupcake ATMs, is no more.

item.title: In 2026, AI will move from hype to pragmatism
item.description: In 2026, here's what you can expect from the AI industry: new architectures, smaller models, world models, reliable agents, physical AI, and products designed for real-world use.

item.title: High-end PC gaming is in big trouble, thanks to AI – and RTX 5090 price hikes are prime examples
item.description: Gaming GPU price hikes are about to be obscene, and the RTX 5090 is a prime example.

item.title: Tesla’s fourth quarter sales fell a lot more than expected
item.description: Tesla's sales fell in the fourth quarter of 2025, as rising competition and the expiration of the federal EV tax credit continued to sap the company's global ambitions. The numbers were a lot worse than many Wall Street analysts were expecting. The disappointing sales report raises the question whether Tesla can reverse its downward fortune […]

item.title: Windows 11 progresse en flèche chez les joueurs
item.description: Windows 11 a pris du galon au mois de décembre, du moins chez les joueurs. Le sondage sur le matériel Steam montre une forte augmentation de l'utilisation du système d'exploitation, au détriment de Windows 10 et de Linux, qui avait pourtant enregistré une belle progression en novembre.

item.title: Ce câble a empêché le connecteur d’une RTX 5090 de fondre, mais comment ?
item.description: Un internaute raconte comment un câble d'alimentation spécifique a sauvé sa carte graphique Nvidia RTX 5090 dont le connecteur menaçait de brûler.

item.title: Trump Mobile T1 : pourquoi le smartphone MAGA est désormais officiellement en retard
item.description: Piloté par les fils aînés du président américain, le projet de smartphone MAGA « Trump Mobile T1 » restera encore pour un moment à l'état de projet. Annoncé en juin dernier, l'appareil devait initialement arriver sur le marché avant la fin d'année. Un évènement politique survenu cet automne aux États-Unis en a décidé autrement.

item.title: How Trump’s tariffs and fight with the Fed shaped the U.S. stock market in 2025
item.description: It was a good year for investors who weathered historic swings in the market. The year 2025 was scary good for investors.It was scary because the U.S. stock market plunged to several historic drops on worries about everything from President Donald Trump’s tariffs to interest rates to a possible bubble in artificial-intelligence technology. In the end, though, it was a good year for anyone with the stomach to stick through the swings.S&P 500 index funds, which sit at the heart of many savers’ 401(k) accounts, returned nearly 18% in 2025 and set a record high on Dec. 24. It was their third strai...

item.title: Xiaomi Poco F7 5G : écran AMOLED 1,5K, grosse batterie 6 500 mAh et quasi -50% sur le prix
item.description: Puissance et petit prix font bon ménage : le Xiaomi Poco F7, un smartphone taillé pour le gaming et noté 8/10 par nos soins, voit son prix tombé à 258 € au lieu de 453 €. Une belle occasion de s’offrir des performances dignes des meilleurs sans exploser son budget.

item.title: Elon Musk's Grok AI posted CSAM image following safeguard 'lapses'
item.description: Elon Musk's Grok AI has been allowing users to transform photographs of woman and children into sexualized and compromising images, Bloomberg reported. The issue has created an uproar among users on X and prompted an "apology" from the bot itself. "I deeply regret an incident on Dec. 28, 2025, where I generated and shared an AI image of two young girls (estimated ages 12-16) in sexualized attire based on a user's prompt," Grok said in a post. An X representative has yet to comment on the matter. According to the Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network, CSAM includes "AI-generated content that ma...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani banned Raspberry Pi devices from his inauguration as New York mayor - here's why
item.description: Attendees of Zohran Mamdani's NYC mayoral inauguration were blocked from bringing Raspberry Pi devices.

item.description: Apple Fitness+ is kicking off 2026 with new workout programs aimed at encouraging users to jump into – or jump back into – yoga, strength, or HIIT.

item.title: 3 defining trends for cybersecurity in 2026
item.description: It’s time to reimagine cybersecurity, based on what’s to come. The past year was a landmark for AI proliferation, with sweeping implications for virtually every area of business and life. But with progress came peril. We saw cyberattacks explode in number and sophistication, outmaneuvering legacy security defenses to create record damage.

item.title: 5 soft skills that set exceptional leaders apart
item.description: Artificial intelligence can take some roles, but executives need to hone these human traits.

item.title: Who is the Secret Traitor in The Traitors UK season 4? These players are already ruled out
item.description: The Traitors UK season 4 returned on New Year's Day with a shocking twist: there's a secret traitor in our midst. But just who is it, and who has been ruled out?

item.title: Le patron de Microsoft admet que l’IA générative doit encore prouver son utilité réelle
item.description: Les grands acteurs de l'IA générative semblent vivre dans un monde où leur technologie est acceptée à bras ouverts par des centaines de millions d'utilisateurs béats, mais la réalité est bien plus nuancée — dans les faits, il existe une vraie opposition et cela pourrait ne pas aller en s'arrangeant. Satya Nadella, le patron de Microsoft, en a conscience et s'interroge sur la légitimité sociale de l'IA....

item.title: Health subsidies officially expired on Jan.1. Millions will see insurance costs skyrocket in 2026
item.description: The Urban Institute and Commonwealth Fund projects higher premiums could force over 4 million Americans to forgo coverage in 2026. Enhanced tax credits that have helped reduce the cost of health insurance for the vast majority of Affordable Care Act enrollees expired overnight, cementing higher health costs for millions of Americans at the start of the new year.Democrats forced a 43-day government shutdown over the issue. Moderate Republicans called for a solution to save their 2026 political aspirations. President Donald Trump floated a way out, only to back off after conservative backlash.In...
